name: Free-Running
author: will mitchell & jason nanna
description: Stock experimental firmware for VIA.  Implements the broadest combination of mode parameters for high configurability.

name: Sync
author: will mitchell & jason nanna
description: Generates output waveform at fractional rates of input clock, specified by scanning a 2d matrix of ratios

name: trigseq
author: will mitchell
description: Trig input steps through a morphable logic sequence which is applied as gates to the analog A and B inputs

name: OSC1
author: will mitchell & jason nanna
description: Wavetable oscillator with through-zero FM, phase modulation, CV control over morph or skew, and configurable sync behavior
